workflow.name: Voice & text control for Home Assistant using Telegram, Whisper & Gemini
workflow.description:
## üìù Workflow Description

This workflow creates a conversational bridge between Telegram / n8n Chat and Home Assistant.
It allows users to control smart home devices or request information using natural language (text or voice).

‚∏ª

## üîë Key Features
- Multi-channel input: Works with both Telegram and n8n‚Äôs chat interface.
- Voice support: Telegram voice messages are transcribed to text using OpenAI Whisper.
- AI-driven assistant: Google Gemini processes queries in natural language.
- Home Assistant integration: Uses MCP client tools to execute actions like turning devices on/off, adjusting lights, or broadcasting messages.
- Memory management: Short-term memory keeps context within conversations.
- Smart reply routing: Responses are automatically sent back to the correct channel (Telegram or chat).
- Message formatting: Telegram replies are beautified (bold, bullet points, inline code, links).

‚∏ª

## üìå Node Overview
- Telegram Trigger: Captures incoming Telegram messages (text or voice).
- Bot Is Typing: Sends a ‚Äútyping‚Ä¶‚Äù action to indicate the bot is working.
- Voice or Text: Separates voice and text inputs.
- Get Voice File ‚Üí Speech to Text ‚Üí Transcription to ChatInput: Handles Telegram voice notes by downloading the file, transcribing it, and preparing it for the chat pipeline.
- When Chat Message Received: Captures messages from n8n‚Äôs built-in chat interface.
- Process Messages: Normalizes incoming data (input text, source, session ID, voice flag).
- Home Agent: Main AI agent that processes queries.
- Google Gemini Chat Model: Language model for intent understanding and conversation.
- Simple Memory & Simple Memory1: Buffer memories to preserve conversation context.
- Home Assistant Connector: MCP client node that executes smart home actions (turn on/off devices, adjust lights, etc.).
- Reply Router: Routes the assistant‚Äôs response either to Telegram or to the n8n chat webhook.
- Telegram Message Beautifier ‚Üí Telegram Send: Formats and sends responses back to Telegram.
- Respond to Webhook: Sends responses to n8n chat.

‚∏ª

## üöÄ Example Use Cases
- Send ‚ÄúTurn on the living room lights‚Äù via Telegram ‚Üí Bot triggers Home Assistant action.
- Ask ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the temperature in the bedroom?‚Äù ‚Üí Response comes back formatted in Telegram.
- Record a voice note ‚ÄúGoodnight mode‚Äù ‚Üí Automatically transcribed and executed by Home Assistant.
- Use n8n chat to quickly trigger automations or check device statuses.

‚∏ª

## ‚ö°Ô∏è Benefits
- Unified chat & voice control for Home Assistant.
- AI-powered natural language understanding.
- Works seamlessly across platforms (Telegram & n8n chat).
- Extensible: new tools or intents can be added easily.

parameters.content:
## When chat message received:

Captures messages from n8n‚Äôs built-in chat and feeds into normalization pipeline.

## Telegram Trigger:
Listens for incoming Telegram messages (text or voice).

## Bot Is typing:
Sends ‚Äútyping‚Ä¶‚Äù action back to Telegram for better UX feedback.

## Voice or Text:
Checks if the message is voice ‚Üí routes to STT; otherwise uses text directly.
## If Voice Node:
Branch: if text missing, route through speech transcription.

### Get Voice File:
Downloads the voice message from Telegram for transcription.

### Speech to Text:
Transcribes voice input into text using OpenAI Whisper.

### Transcription to ChatInput:
Maps transcribed text into unified chatInput field.

### Process messages:
Normalizes inputText, detects source (chat/telegram), and builds sessionId.

### Telegram Message Beautifier:
Formats output: bold, bullets, inline code, links ‚Äì splits into chunks.

## Home Agent:
Core AI agent that orchestrates LLM and Home Assistant actions.

## Home Assistant Connector:

Executes smart home actions: turn lights on/off, set brightness, broadcast messages via MCP.

## Reply Router:
Routes response back to Telegram or n8n chat UI depending on origin.

### Telegram Send:
Sends formatted reply back to Telegram in HTML parse mode.

### Respond to Webhook:
Streams responses back to the n8n chat frontend webhook.

**Workflow Name:** Home Assistant Whisper

**What it does:**
This workflow bridges natural conversation (via Telegram or n8n Chat) with Home Assistant. Users send commands‚Äîtext or voice‚Äîand the system:
* Transcribes voice using Whisper
* Normalizes input, maintains session context
* Uses Google Gemini + an AI agent to understand intent
* Triggers smart home actions via MCP (turn lights on/off, adjust brightness, broadcast)
* Formats and routes responses back to the correct channel‚ÄîTelegram or n8n Chat‚Äîwith polished markdown/HTML formatting.

**Key highlights:**
- Multi-channel (chat + voice)
- Short-term memory for context
- AI-powered intent understanding
- Smart routing and beautified responses
- Modular design‚Äîeasy to extend or tweak

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
